DOC.brief_title: Use Flaxseed ( Alpha Linolenic Acid ) Powder Morbidly Obese Patients With Systemic Inflammation
DOC.detailed_description: Population : Morbidly obese non-smoking patient Department Gastroenterology , candidate possible bariatric treatment Criteria inclusion : Males female , 18- 65 year old , body mass index/BMI > 40 kg/m2 ( > 35 kg/m2 comorbidities ) , non-hospitalized receive general oral diet , elevate C-reactive protein/ CRP ( > 5mg/L ) , sign informed consent ; Criteria exclusion : SIRS , shock , coma organ failure , fever infectious focus , cancer without chemo/radiotherapy , inflammatory illness ( rhematic , gastrointestinal ) , transplantation immunologic disease , trauma , surgery hospitalization last 30 day , use steroidal non-steroidal anti-inflammatory immune-modulating agent antibiotic , refusal participate study ; Dietetic routine : Daily flaxseed powder ( Farinha de linhaca dourada ) 60 g/day ( 232 kcal , contain 10 g alpha-linolenic acid/ALA ) placebo ( commercial manioc flour 60 g/day , 120 kcal ) ) 12 week . An additional 60 subject ( 30 patient , 30 control ) manage 30 ml/day flaxseed oil ( 10 g alpha-linolenic acid/ALA ) 30 ml/day placebo ( safflower oil ) . Methods : Clinical questionnaire , nutritional assessment ( Weight , height , BMI ) Biochemical test : Hemoglobin ( HB ) , white blood cell count ( WBC ) , total cholesterol ( CHOL ) fraction ( HDL , LDL , VLDL ) , triglyceride ( TRIG ) , blood glucose ( GLU ) , serum albumin ( ALB ) , insulin ( INS ) , leptin ( LEP ) , C-reactive protein ( CRP ) , serum amyloid A ( SAA ) , complement fraction C3 C4 , coagulation profile Atherosclerosis marker : Arterial stiffness ( aorta ) intima thickness ( common carotid artery )
